title: Segovia
knownFor: Famous for its remarkably preserved Roman aqueduct, fairy-tale Alcázar castle, and delicious cochinillo (roast suckling pig). A perfect blend of Roman, medieval, and Renaissance architecture.
howToGetThere: High-speed train (AVE/AVANT) from Chamartín to Segovia-Guiomar (27-30 min, fastest option). Bus from Moncloa also available (1h 20min).
